definitions.title: oppress, maltreat
definitions.body: (NH Hiph. vex with words; so Aram. Aph. [[אוֹנִי]], but also Targum for Heb. [[הוֹנׇה]] maltreat; Ar. wanay is laxus, debilis fuit, IV. debilitavit, defatigavit, but connex. dub.)—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. 1 pl. sf. [[נִינׇם]] Ps 74:8; Pt. [[יוֹנׇה]] Je 25:38 + 3 t. + Ps 123:4 (v. infr.);—suppress (?) sq. acc. Ps 74:8 (text dub.); elsewhere oppress; Pt. abs. as adj. [[הָעִיר הַיּוֹנׇה]] Zep 3:1; subst. f. coll. [[הַיּוֹנׇה]] oppressors Je 25:38 (but rd. [[חֶרֶב]] for [[חֲרוֹן]], with LXX Ew Hi Gf Ke etc., as Je 46:16, Je 50:16); Ps 123:4 Qr [[לִגְאֵי יוֹנִים]] proudest oppressors (st. cstr. in superlat., cf. Ges:§ 133, 3, R. 1; yet most follow Kt [[לּגּאייונים]], and der. from [[גַּאֲיוֹן]] q.v. p. 145 supr.)

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. [[הוֹנׇה]] Ez Eze 18:12, Eze 18:16; [[הוֹנוּ]] Eze 22:7, Eze 22:29; Impf. [[יוֹנֶה]] Eze 18:7; 2 ms. [[תּיׁנֶה]] Ex 22:20; [[תּוֹנֶנּוּ]] De 23:17; [[יוֹנוּ]] Ez Eze 45:8; [[תּוֹנוּ]] Le 19:33 + 2 t.; [[תּׂנוּ]] Je 22:3; Inf. sf. [[הוֹנׁתָם]] Ez Eze 46:18; Pt. [[מוֹנַ֫יִךְ]] Is 49:26; —oppress, maltreat, sq. acc., esp. of ill-treatment of poor and weak, partic. of the [[גֵּר]], the ‘stranger,’ sojourner, by the rich and powerful, Ex 22:20 (JE), Le 19:33, Le 25:14, Le 25:17 (H), De 23:17, Je 22:3, Ez Eze 18:7, Eze 18:12, Eze 18:16, Eze 22:7, Eze 22:29, Eze 45:8, Eze 46:18; of a foreign oppressor only Is 49:26.
